attributes.action: Make it a criminal offence for members of parliament to lie in parliament.
attributes.additional_details:
Lying or misleading Parliament should become a criminal offence, say MPs as Government considers using powers last used 150 years ago
http://www.dailymail.co.uk/news/article-2176841/Lying-misleading-Parliament-criminal-offence.html
attributes.background: The powers have never been used and senior MPs are keen to consider whether prosecution might be a possibility in the future.
